divs: Sighting DetailsWe were about to go to bed when my wife wanted to see the fireworks again from our bedroom window. She yelled to me DOC! DOC! What is this red light? I didn't feel like getting up, so being a wise ass I said it's fireworks! She said NO! GET UP OFF YOUR ASS AND COME LOOK!! I SAID AGAIN ITS FIREWORKS! SHE SAID DOC GET YOUR ASS OUT THE BED AND COME LOOK!I got out the bed and behold! A bright red object was floating northbound from the south which is actually the direction from LaGuardia airport.I was astonished because since we had been couple I've been an amateur UFO researcher for reasons I won't get into now!I yelled NOW DO YOU BELIEVE ME I TOLD YOU THEY ARE REAL EXCEPT THE FIRST ONE I SAW WAS MASSIVE LIKE HELL
